values.help:
This parameter determines which actions result in sending scene IDs and attributes assigned to them.
				1 - Key Pressed 1 time.
				2 - Key Pressed 2 times.
				4 - Key Pressed 3 times.
				8 - Key Pressed 4 times.
				16 - Key Pressed 5 times.
				32 - Key Held Down.
				64 - Key Released.
				Note: Values of parameter 1 may be combined, e.g. 1+2=3 means that scenes will be sent after pressing the button once or twice.
				Default: 127 All.
values.label: Scenes sent to the controller

values.help:
This parameter defines how commands are sent in specified association groups: as secure or non-secure.
				Parameter is active only in Z-Wave network security mode. It does not apply to 1st Lifeline group.
				1 - 2nd group sent as secure.
				2 - 3rd group sent as secure.
				4 - 4th group sent as secure.
				Default: 3 All.
values.label: Associations in Z-Wave network security mode

values.help: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in 2nd association group after a single click
values.label: Key Pressed 1 time - command sent to 2nd association group

values.help: This parameter defines value of SWITCH ON command sent to devices in 2nd association group after a single click.
values.label: Key Pressed 1 times - value of SWITCH ON command sent to 2nd association group

values.help: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in 2nd association group after a double click
values.label: Key Pressed 2 time - command sent to 2nd association group

values.help: This parameter defines value of SWITCH ON command sent to devices in 2nd association group after a double click.
values.label: Key Pressed 2 times - value of SWITCH ON command sent to 2nd association group

values.help: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in 2nd association group after a triple click
values.label: Key Pressed 3 time - command sent to 2nd association group

values.help: This parameter defines value of SWITCH ON command sent to devices in 2nd association group after a triple click.
values.label: Key Pressed 3 times - value of SWITCH ON command sent to 2nd association group

values.help: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in 2nd association group after a single click
values.label: Key Pressed 1 time - command sent to 3rd association group

values.help: This parameter defines value of SWITCH ON command sent to devices in 3rd association group after a single click.
values.label: Key Pressed 1 times - value of SWITCH ON command sent to 3rd association group

values.help: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in 3rd association group after a double click
values.label: Key Pressed 2 time - command sent to 3rd association group

values.help: This parameter defines value of SWITCH ON command sent to devices in 3rd association group after a double click.
values.label: Key Pressed 2 times - value of SWITCH ON command sent to 3rd association group

values.help: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in 3rd association group after a triple click
values.label: Key Pressed 3 time - command sent to 3rd association group

values.help: This parameter defines value of SWITCH ON command sent to devices in 3rd association group after a triple click.
values.label: Key Pressed 3 times - value of SWITCH ON command sent to 3rd association group

values.help: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in 3rd association group after holding the button down.
values.label: Key Held Down - command sent to 3rd association group

values.help:
Parameter determines which actions result in sending alarm frames to 4th association group.
				1 - Key Pressed 1 time.
				2 - Key Pressed 2 times.
				4 - Key Pressed 3 times.
				8 - Key Pressed 4 times.
				16 - Key Pressed 5 times.
				32 - Key Held Down.
				64 - Key Released.
				Default: 127 All.
values.label: Alarm frame triggers
